item.title: Report X-2025021209
item.description:
Report X-2025021209

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-20
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2025021209 During sort operations at the INDH location a fork lift struck a wooden skid and damaged a fiberboard box. The fiberboard box contained two metal cans and spilled all of its contents. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement. X-2025021210 During sort operations at the INDH location a fork lift struck a wooden skid and damaged a fiberboard box. The fiberboard box contained two metal cans and spilled all of its contents. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
